channel.title: IP Won't Work
channel.description: Ok, well on my client, I can use the IP 127.0.0.1 to connect to my server, but if i give client to others, it wont work for them. But if I switch it to my IP or my no-ip, it doesnt work... anyone know whats wrong? I have Windows Vista...this may effect it, I dunno

item.title: IP Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Accessing server from your computer, and hosted on your computer -> IP == 127.0.0.1(localhost)
Accessing server from a computer, but hosted somewhere else -> IP == server.no-ip.org
Someone else accessing server from their computer -> IP == server.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: IP Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

You can find where to change other players connection port and server in client.java
search for…

playerServer = "
in client class

(server files)

item.title: IP Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @52x32x52x1 52x32x52x1
item.description:
@52x32x52x1 wrote:

Ok, well on my client, I can use the IP 127.0.0.1 to connect to my server, but if i give client to others, it wont work for them.

PLease rephrase this. Have you created a no-ip? have you installed no-ip? have you made a server, or are you just using the ip adress on moparscape client. If you mean 127.0.0.1 wont connect on other clients, its beacause you have to make your own.

Read full topic
